loader.synchronizing: Your wallet is now synchronizing with the Gulden network. This may take some time to complete.

setup.choose_password: Choose a password of at least 6 characters
setup.choose_password_information: You will need your password to unlock your wallet. Make sure it is not easy to guess because anyone who knows your password can access your funds.
setup.create_new: I do not have a Gulden wallet yet
setup.enter_existing_recovery_phrase: Enter your recovery phrase in the boxes below to restore your wallet.

invalid_recovery_phrase.title: Invalid recovery phrase
invalid_recovery_phrase.message: This combinatie is not a valid recovery phrase. Correct the error(s) and try again.

setup.recover_existing: I already have a Gulden wallet
setup.repeat_your_recovery_phrase: To make sure you have correctly written down your recovery phrase, enter your phrase in the boxes below.
setup.this_is_your_recovery_phrase: This is your recovery phrase. Keep your backup phrase in a safe place. Lose phrase or someone else with access to the phrase = lose Gulden.
